contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 28, 1949 D National Australian Eisteddfod (A Grade)
National Australian Eisteddfod (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest National Australian Eisteddfod national-australian-eisteddfod-a-grade
None
A Grade
Themes from Symphony no. 5 [Tchaikovsky]
Ballarat Oval, Ballarat, Victoria, Australia Fri 28th Oct - Test Piece (afternoon, City Oval) Sat 29th Oct - Own Choice (9.30 AM), Quickstep (2.45 PM), Street March (7.15 PM, through city to the City Oval), Special Night Quickstep (7.45 PM)
Special Quickstep: 1 South Australian Police 85 2 St. Kilda 84
Street March (Combined A and B Grades) 1 Ballarat Soldiers' Memorial Band 36 2 St. Kilda 34
Solo competitions (judge Frank Wright)
Soprano Cornet: Ian Bassett (St Kilda) by 5 pts Cornet: Ken Smith (St Kilda) by 4 pts
Duet: Ken Smith and G. R. Mowat (St Kilda) by 4 pts
8 bands played.
Source: St Kilda 1961 Diamond Jubilee booklet (available online: http://www.stkildabrass.org.nz/pdfs/1901-1961.pdf, pp. 16-19)
July 26, 2012, 1:14 p.m. April 21, 2020, 12:20 p.m.

2 City of Ballarat Municipal Brass Band Alfred Rowell
Unknown Result Brisbane Excelsior Band Jim Compton
